body.name: Makeup Mirror with Lights, 2-Sided Vanity Mirror with 1X/10X Magnification Rechargeable 3 in 1 Hand Held Desk and Hanging Lighted Mirror 3 Colors Lighting Stepless Dimming for Home
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 29 mins
features: 3-in-1 Multipurpose Makeup Mirror: The Alovely lighted handheld mirror is a beauty game-changer! It can be used not only as a regular handheld mirror, but also as a standing mirror on the table and as a hanging mirror. It also has 3 light color temperatures, adjustable brightness, double-sided 1X/10X magnification, Type-C rechargeable battery, 350° rotatable stand and other functions. So whether at home or on the go, this mirror is your beauty must-have. A perfect blend of functionality and style!

3 Light Modes & Stepless Dimming: The Alovely light up mirror offers 3 colors of lighting: with warm, natural and cool settings, you can adjust the lighting to match any environment or occasion. Through stepless dimming, the mirror's brightness can be continuously adjusted to meet your needs, and it also has an intelligent memory function that retains the brightness of the last used light for easy use next time, saves the trouble of frequent adjustments.

1X/10X Double-Sided Magnification: Get a close-up view of your face with the mirror's double-sided magnification, which allows you to switch between 1X and 10X magnification. Use the 1X side for general makeup application and the 10X magnification side for precise details like eyebrows and eyeliner. This is definitely a perfect addition for those with poor eyesight and makeup lovers.

Foldable and Rotatable Stand: The mirror is equipped with an adjustable stand. When the stand is unfolded, it can be used as a desktop or hanging. The stand is rotatable 350°, you can adjust to the right angle as needed, also it's very sturdy and stands up nicely on its own. When the stand is folding, it becomes a perfect handheld mirror. The ergonomic design of the stand handle is very good, and you won't feel uncomfortable at all when holding and using the mirror. It is your portable beauty companion!

Cordless 1200mAh Rechargeable Battery: Built-in 1200mAh rechargeable lithium battery, wireless use, Type-C charging, battery life up to 8 hours, also has a 30-minute scheduled shutdown function, you'll love that it's rechargeable rather than using AA or something, which makes it an eco-friendly choice.

Ideal Gift for Her: Whether it’s birthday, anniversary, Mother’s Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, or any holiday, the vanity mirror with lights makes for a thoughtful and practical gift that any beauty enthusiast will appreciate. Its versatile features and stylish design make it an ideal gift for makeup lovers, travelers, or anyone who wants to look their best.
